Description.Text: Located in a beach area of Rhodes Island, the 3-star Esmeralda offers a cocktail lounge, an outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace. A 20-minute ride from Rodini Park, The Water Park and Temple of Apollon. Nestled in the northern district and 10km from the city center. The hotel offers 20 rooms. All of them feature a closet, satellite TV, a kitchenette, a private balcony and individual climate control. Guests can also use kitchenware, a stove and an electric kettle available in each room. The hotel offers currency exchange, a safe deposit box and a cash machine; maid service, bicycle rental and 24-hour reception are also provided.
